scenario: Mycoplasma gallisepticum is a type of bacteria that causes a respiratory disease in both domestic birds like chickens and also wild birds like house finches.  Birds can be either susceptible (S), infected (I) with the disease or may die from the disease or another cause (D).  House finches around Ithaca New York were studied once a week by ornithologists from Cornell University and the following transition probability matrix was found to apply to the three states S, I, and D: \(\begin{bmatrix}0.9 & 0.05 & 0.05\\0.1 & 0.7 & 0.2 \\ 0 & 0 & 1\end{bmatrix}\)
question: In this population, what is the probability that a susceptible bird would be infected the following week

scenario: Mycoplasma gallisepticum is a type of bacteria that causes a respiratory disease in both domestic birds like chickens and also wild birds like house finches.  Birds can be either susceptible (S), infected (I) with the disease or may die from the disease or another cause (D).  House finches around Ithaca New York were studied once a week by ornithologists from Cornell University and the following transition probability matrix was found to apply to the three states S, I, and D: \(\begin{bmatrix}0.9 & 0.05 & 0.05\\0.1 & 0.7 & 0.2 \\ 0 & 0 & 1\end{bmatrix}\)
question: For this Markov Chain
A: the S, I, and D states are all recurrent
B: the S and D states are transient and the I state is recurrent
C: the I and D states are recurrent and the S state is absorbing
D: the S and I states are transient and the D state is absorbing
answer: the S and I states are transient and the D state is absorbing
